name: Vansh Sharma
title: Full Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
bio: I'm a passionate software developer with expertise in building modern web applications and AI-powered solutions. I love creating elegant, user-friendly experiences that solve real-world problems.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
highlights: Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Led the university's coding club for 2 years
Won multiple hackathons and coding competitions
Published research paper on RAG systems

experience.description: Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs and optimized database queries, improving response times by 40%.
Researched and implemented RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) systems. Built custom embedding pipelines and vector stores for knowledge retrieval.
Built websites and applications for small businesses and startups. Specialized in e-commerce solutions and AI integrations.

projects.name: AI Portfolio RAG Chat
projects.description: A premium portfolio website with an AI-powered chat interface that uses RAG to answer questions about my skills and experience. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Gemini API.

projects.name: SmartNote AI
projects.description: An intelligent note-taking application that uses AI to summarize, organize, and search notes. Features include voice-to-text, automatic categorization, and semantic search.

projects.name: CodeBuddy
projects.description: A VS Code extension that provides AI-powered code suggestions, documentation generation, and bug detection. Used by over 5,000 developers.

projects.name: EcoTrack
projects.description: A mobile-first web app that helps users track their carbon footprint and suggests eco-friendly alternatives. Features gamification and social sharing.

achievements: Top 100 Developers on GitHub in India
Google Cloud Certified - Professional Cloud Architect
Published author - 'Building RAG Systems at Scale'
